_PAGE_FILTER_EMAIL_ARGUMENTS_EMAIL_: The email address for which the HTML link is to be created
_PAGE_FILTER_EMAIL_ARGUMENTS_LINK_CLASS_: A CSS class that will be added to the created HTML link
_PAGE_FILTER_EMAIL_DESCRIPTION_: The function filterEmail creates an HTML link for an email address. It checks if the email address exists and is not empty. If the conditions are met, an HTML link in the format <a href="mailto:email" class="linkClass">email</a> is returned.
